title: What You NeedInstructionsRecipe Note
directions: Ingredients 2 or more large eggs 1 teaspoon unsalted butter 1 teaspoon heavy cream or whole milk per egg, optional 1/4 teaspoon salt Pepper Chopped fresh herbs, optional
Equipment Bowl Whisk or fork Skillet or saucepan, preferably nonstick or cast iron (use a bit of extra butter if cooking in stainless steel) Wooden spoon or spatula
